titleStmt.title: SII 7.499: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 499. (A.R. No. 279 of 1901). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kovirājakecariparummarkki yāṇṭu
Āvatu Eyināṭṭut tevatāṉan tirupper sabhai
yom Ivvāṇṭu dhanunāyiṟṟut tiṅkaṭkiḻamai
peṟṟa kārttikai naāḷ pakal pe ḻet tirumu
ṟṟatte dhanmi ceytu kūṭṭak kuṟaivarak kūṭiyiruntu paṇippaṇi
yāl paṇittu viṟṟukkuṭutta nilavilaiyāvaṇamāvatu kiḷiyūr
nāṭṭu ciṟutavūruṭaiyāṉ veḷāṉ viranāraṇaṉāṉa cempiyaṉvetive
ḷāṉukku viṟṟukkuṭutta nilattukku kiḻpāṟkellai pirāntakaṉvāykkālu
kku merkkum teṉpāṟkellai kāccuva ṉārāyaṇaṉ mātava ṉuḷḷiṭṭā
r nilattukkum cuntaracoḻamaṅkalat tellaikkum Inta Ūrellaikku
kkum kiḻakkum vaṭapā
ṟkellai ĀṭiEllaikkum parāntakaṉvāykkālukkum teṟkum Ivvi
caitta perunāṉkellaiuḷ Akappaṭṭa nilattuḷ poṟśrīko
yiṟṟevar nilam māccāttacey mukkālum nikki niṉṟa nilamuṇṇila
m Oḻiviṉṟi sabhaiyom kāccuvaṉ Aṅki vāsutevaṉpakkal vilai
koṇṭuṭaiya nilamum Āritaṉ ceṭṭi kumaraṉum Ivaṉ ṟampi maṭṭaṉ ce
ṭṭi Aṅkiyum Ivaṉ ṟampi ceṭṭi nilakaṇṭaṉum Ivaṉ ṟampi ceṭṭi
cāttaṉum Ivaṉ ṟampi ceṭṭi comatattaṉum pakkal vilaikoṇṭa ni
lamum pālāśriyaṉ kaṇṭa nilakaṇṭaṉ pakkal vilaikoṇṭuṭai
ya nilamum kāccuva ṉārāyaṇa paṟpaṉāpaṉpakkal vilaikoṇṭu
ṭaiya nilamum pālāśriyaṉ pirama nilakaṇṭaṉum pālāśriyaṉ nārāya
ṇaṉ piramaṉ pakkal vilaikoṇṭuṭaiya nilamum pālāśriyaṉ
subrahmaṇya nārāyaṇaṉ pakkal vilaikoṇṭuṭaiya nilamum ka
viśiyaṉ paṭṭaṉaṅki tāmotiraṉ pakkal vilaikoṇṭuṭai
ya nilamum kāccuvaṉ śrī nakkaṉceṭṭi pakkal vilaikoṇṭuṭaiya
nilamum Āka Ivvellaikku naṭuvupaṭṭa nilaṉ sabhaiyom
Uvaccakāṇi nakkaṉ kumaraṉukkum tiru
ccaṭaimuṭi Uvaccaṉ kāṭaṉ vempa
ṉukkum kākuttaṉ caruppetikku
m ceytu kuṭutta nilam māyila
ṉ karai Oṉṟaraiye Iraṇṭumā
vum melkarampaiyil teṉmeṟ
kkaṭaiya nāṉmāvum Ittevar paḻani
m koṇṭu Eṭṭāḷ koṭṭuvi
I śrīkoyil Immuvaṟkum Uvaccakkā
ṇi cantrāĀtittavaṟ kāṇi ceytu kuṭutte
ṉ vaṭavāykuṭi nāṉmāvuḷ cantrā
tittaval kāṇi ceytu kuṭutteṉ cem
piyaṉ vetiveḷāṉeṉ
8 10mpatiṉ kaḻañcu poṉ policaiyāka maṉṟa
ppeṟuvatākavum Ipparicoṭṭi Ippoṉ koṇ
ṭu Innila miṟaiyiliyāka viṟṟu vilaiāvaṇañ ce
ytu kuṭut ciṟutavūruṭaiyāṉ veḷāṉ viranārāyaṇaṉāṉa ce
mpiyaṉ vetiveḷāṉukku peruṅkuṟi sabhaiyom sabhaipa
ṇiyāl Innilavilaiyāvaṇa meḻutiṉeṉ Ivvūr madhyastan bra
hmapriyaṉāṉa māṟan kāttāṉeṉ Ivai Eṉ ṉeḻuttu Ippa
ṭi yaṟiveṉ Ivvūrk kāviti Alaṅkārapriyaṉāṉa kecavanantiyeṉ
Ippaṭi yaṟiveṉ māmāttiraṉ Āttirayaṉ mārttāṇṭa kaṇṭaṉeṉ I
ppaṭi yaṟiveṉ pālāśriyaṉ cāttaṅ kaḷvaṉeṉ Ippaṭi yaṟi
veṉ pālāśriya nakkaṉ comaṉeṉ Ippaṭi yaṟiveṉ
nārāyaṇaṉ pālāśriyaṉ kumaraṉ
nilakaṇṭaṉeṉ Ippaṭi yaṟiveṉ kaviciya Aṅki tāmotiraṉe
ṉ Ippaṭi yaṟiveṉ pālāśriya nilakaṇṭa naṅkiyeṉ Ippa
ṭi yaṟiveṉ kāccuva ṉaṅki vāsudevaṉeṉ Ippaṭi yaṟiveṉ
kāccuvaṉ nārāyaṇaṉ mātevaṉeṉ . Iññilam nāṉ vilaiko
ṇṭuṭaiyaparice Ivvūrt tiruppuṟattuṟai Emperumāṉukku kal
lāle śrīvimāna meḻuntaruḷuvittu devatāṉamāka Udakapūrvvañce
ytu kuṭuttu Innilam nibandhañceyta paritāvatu Uvaccu Eṭṭāḷ ko
ṇṭu koṭṭuvārāka muṉpu Ittevar nilamāṉa kāṟcey Uṭpaṭak kuṭu
nāḻi
kaippuṟattukkum tiruviḻāvukkumāka Ippaṭi ceytukuṭutteṉ
cempiyaṉ vetiveḷāṉeṉ Itu panmāheśvara rakṣai Itu kā
ttār śrīpātam Eṉ talai melaṉa .
Digital edition of SII 7.499 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
